website_summaries.verdict: One of the most functional chandeliers on the market. Three individual light rings provide plenty of illumination around a medium-to-large size room.
pros: Individual mounting points makes each light independently adjustable in height
Can create different arrangements and layouts using the three rings
cons: Chandelier requires special lights when a replacement is needed

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: What a conversation piece! It's very bright so make sure your dimmer will work with it.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Price

customer_reviews.title: Really neat. I like it.
customer_reviews.text: OK this was just set up with no adjustments it looks really bright not too hard of a set up I did have a professional electrician help me the wires need to be untangled before you put it up . I put a dimmer on it even though these LEDs are not rated for dimming. Just so you keep it above 30% it really was not blinking .
customer_reviews.author: J. Lum

customer_reviews.title: This light is NOT yellow
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned initially buying this product as it looked yellow. It is NOT. it is black on the outside and white where the light is. It is exactly what I was looking for in my foyer. I have not installed yet as my home is not finished yet. I bought early to ensure the light looked correct and it does. I can’t wait to hang it!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa M. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Just great looking and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the same fixture 2 times. Once for my apartment and 1 for my daughters apartment.. Just great looking and quick delivery. thank you
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN KRAMER

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great looking light! Very easy to install and adjust with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's a good looking lighting and brighter than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: nsle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture. Yellowish light. Not bright enough for its size.
customer_reviews.author: amv6

customer_reviews.title: NOT a pleasant set-up but it looks cool once the stars align and untangle it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did wrong but 3 of the images you see are what you get when you pull it straight out of the box and up onto your ceiling. I read the other reviews about tangling wires so I was very careful about lifting it directly out without twisting. What a mess! It figured itself out when I pulled it back down and pulled the box part back through the tangled mess (as you can see from the fourth pic). Easy install and looks good but take heed from other reviewers and don't be in a hurry to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rebello

customer_reviews.title: the rubbery tubing around the leds comes out very easily but is difficult to reattach
customer_reviews.text: The fixture was delivered as a tangled mess. We had to literally take each wire out of the casing one by one to untangle and hang the fixture. Also, the rubbery tubing around the leds comes out very easily but is difficult to reattach.
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: great design but poor quality. manufacture assembly wrong., some lights don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Stunning effect
customer_reviews.text: It's even better than expected. I mounted in a "uneven" way and it's stunning. I used a professional installer, but at the end of the day the installation is not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Severini

customer_reviews.title: Defective LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier came defective. One LED bulb does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Ra

product_meta.title: ROYAL PEARL Modern Square Led Chandelier Adjustable Hanging Light Three Ring Collection Contemporary Ceiling Pendant Light H47" X L32" x W32"
feature_bullets: 【WIDE APPLICATION】Size: (L15.7"+L23.6"+L31.5")*H47"max; Designed in a modern shape with three squared rings and adjustable strings; Easy to Install (Canopy: 10.6") and recommended for living room, dining room, foyer, bedroom, Kitchen Island, etc

【MULTIPLE SHAPES】 You will get multiple shapes by adjusting the strings of the three squares easily via cable locking pins, DIY and choosing your favorite shape before install; The strings can be adjusted from 1 to 47 inch; will perfectly fit the height of your ceiling

【LONG LIFESPAN】 High-quality aluminum and silicon finished by powder coating and polishing applied, resulting in high-temperature resistance, anti-corrosion, anti-faded, not easy to scratch, and easy to clean, thereby assuring long lifespan (>50000 hrs)
【IDEAL BRIGHTNESS】 Ideal luminous output for indoor use, up to 8000lm (70lm/w) with CCT Warm White 3000K; CRI up to 80, resulting in high color rendering; Please note that this light is non-dimmable
【WARRANTY&AFTER-SALE】 Two-year warranty and 100% refund or replacement is assured; We have our own factory and a professional engineer team; Contact us anytime！

specifications.Included Components: 1*pendant light+1* glove to protect your hand+2* screws+2*screw sockets+1*installation illustration
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
